results.label: Luzern, Zentral- und Hochschulbibliothek, KB 35 4°
results.description: In addition to sermons and sermon-related material pertaining to Sundays, saints’ days and feast-days dedicated to Mary, the manuscript contains part of S. Bonaventure’s (1221-1274) commentary on the four books of the Sentences of Peter Lombard, and the treatise De arca Noe by Marquard of Lindau (d. 1392).
results.attribution: e-codices - Virtual Manuscript Library of Switzerland
